derivation.yuyuan_name: mid 19th cent. (originally US): of unknown origin
late 16th cent.: frequentative form; perhaps related to dialect dadder 'quake' and daddle 'dawdle'

means.word_mean: 1. small scales from animal skins or hair or bird feathers that can cause allergic reactions in some people
2. a feeling of anger and animosity;
